oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Uncle Dave Macon at Central Hi School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Macon, Uncle Dave, 1870-1952;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Grand Ole Opry star Uncle Dave Macon, also known as "The Dixie Dewdrop," at Central High School on May 12, 1938. Poster features a metal photoplate of Uncle Dave Macon. This poster is a "retail imitation." It is based on an old Hatch Show Print design and was made to be sold to the public. Heritage Poster Co. is the name Hatch Show Print sold these posters under.
